text: Jon Clarke may refer to: *Jon Clarke (rugby union) (born 1983), rugby union player *Jon Clarke (rugby league) (born 1979), rugby league player *Jonty Clarke (Jonathan Clarke, born 1981), English field hockey player *Jonathan Clarke (cyclist), Australian cyclist ==See also== *J. C. D. Clark (Jonathan Clark, born 1951), British historian *Jonathan Clark Rogers (1885–1967), academic *John Clarke (disambiguation)
title: Jon Clarke
